name: BIT'S & PIECES I: WORMS!
description:
The Bit's & Pieces series is an introduction to the vastness of Gion's artistic expressions. Samples that were taken from 50 years of making illustrations and graphic art, a little taste of what is to come. 

WORMS! A tribute to the glorious Pop Culture of the '90s. An era where fun is the most important thing in a science movie.  

This artwork is drawn by hand with pencil and pen on paper. Scanned & very lightly retouched.
